languages.text: {n}Среди стоящих в оцеплении стражей вы узнаете Камиля — молодого разведчика, который {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}вел вас{/d} к командному центру. Встретив ваш взгляд, он улыбается и салютует.{/n}

{n}Among the guards in the security cordon you recognise Camille, the young scout who {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}led you{/d} to the command centre. When he meets your eye, he smiles and salutes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Среди стоящих в оцеплении стражей вы узнаете Камиля — молодого разведчика, который {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}вел вас{/d} к командному центру. Встретив ваш взгляд, он улыбается и салютует.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You recognise Camille, the young scout who took you to the command centre, among the guards in the security cordon. When he meets your eye, he smiles and salutes.{/n}

{n}Among the guards in the security cordon you recognise Camille, the young scout who {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}led you{/d} to the command centre. When he meets your eye, he smiles and salutes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unter den Wachen hinter der Sicherheitsabsperrung erkennst du auch Camille, den jungen Späher, der dich zur Befehlszentrale {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}geführt{/d} hat. Als sich Eure Blicke treffen, grinst er und salutiert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the guards in the security cordon you recognise Camille, the young scout who {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}led you{/d} to the command centre. When he meets your eye, he smiles and salutes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unter den Wachen hinter der Sicherheitsabsperrung erkennst du auch Camille, den jungen Späher, der dich zur Befehlszentrale geführt hat. Als sich Eure Blicke treffen, grinst er und salutiert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parmi les gardes du cordon de sécurité, vous reconnaissez Camille, le jeune éclaireur qui {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}vous avait {mf|conduit|conduite}{/d} au centre de commandement. Croisant votre regard, celui-ci sourit et vous salue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the guards in the security cordon you recognise Camille, the young scout who {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}led you{/d} to the command centre. When he meets your eye, he smiles and salutes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parmi les gardes du cordon de sécurité, vous reconnaissez Camille, le jeune éclaireur qui vous a {mf|conduit|conduite} au centre de commandement. Croisant votre regard, celui-ci sourit et vous salue.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在安全警戒线内的守卫之中，你认出了科米尔，那个{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}带你{/d}去指挥中心的年轻侦察兵。当他与你的目光相遇时，他微笑着向你敬礼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the guards in the security cordon you recognise Camille, the young scout who {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}led you{/d} to the command centre. When he meets your eye, he smiles and salutes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在安全警戒线内的守卫之中，你认出了科米尔，那个带你去指挥中心的年轻侦察兵。当他与你的目光相遇时，他微笑着向你敬礼。{/n}

languages.text: {n}非常線にいる兵士の中に、司令部に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}案内{/d}してくれた若い兵士、カミーユがいることに気づく。男は目が合うと、笑顔で敬礼した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the guards in the security cordon you recognise Camille, the young scout who {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}led you{/d} to the command centre. When he meets your eye, he smiles and salutes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}警備非常線にいる兵士の中に、司令部に案内してくれた若い兵士、カミーユがいることに気づく。男は目が合うと、笑顔で敬礼した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Entre los guardias del cordón de seguridad reconoces a Camille, el joven explorador que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}te condujo{/d} al centro de mando. Cuando te mira a los ojos, sonríe y saluda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the guards in the security cordon you recognise Camille, the young scout who {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}led you{/d} to the command centre. When he meets your eye, he smiles and salutes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Entre los guardias del cordón de seguridad reconoces a Camille, el joven explorador que te condujo al centro de mando. Cuando te mira a los ojos, sonríe y saluda.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Güvenlik kordonundaki muhafızların arasında, seni komuta merkezine {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}getiren{/d} genç keşif eri Camille'i seçebiliyorsun. Gözleriniz buluştuğunda sana tebessüm edip selam veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the guards in the security cordon you recognise Camille, the young scout who {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_KamilSaved}led you{/d} to the command centre. When he meets your eye, he smiles and salutes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Güvenlik kordonundaki muhafızların arasında, seni komuta merkezine getiren genç er Camille'i seçebiliyorsun. Gözleriniz buluştuğunda sana tebessüm ediyor ve selam veriyor.{/n}
